numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice a graph about diversity in the athletic field.
3. The percentile is the percentile of players who are a different race than white.
4. The percentile is the percentile of coaches who are a different race than white.
5. I wonder if races other than white are more popular in the athletic field.
6. This graph has a big impact on me and my community.
7. The white race originated sports around the world.
8. The graph shows that many people from different countries can compete as athletes in any sport.
9. The graph shows that in the professional athletic field there are more players of color than players of any other race.
10. The graph shows that in the professional athletic field there are more coaches of color than coaches of any other race.
11. The title of the graph is "Diversity in the Professional Athletic Field".
